Publik Famille Demo
  • Usage
  • Afficher la source de la page

Usage

Default Users

  • Admin: admin / admin123

  • Parent: parent / parent123

Demo Data

  • Activities: - Cantine (monthly recurring) - Séjour d’été (summer camp)

  • One demo child linked to the parent account.

Navigation

  • /accounts/ : authentication and identity verification

  • /families/ : manage children

  • /activities/ : browse and enroll in activities

  • /billing/ : pay invoices

  • /documents/ : access stored documents

  • /monitoring/ : staff-only logs viewer
